definition.text: So far, you've been confined to the dark side of Superalgos. Get ready to be exposed to the bright side: the Charting Space.

paragraphs.text: The charting space lives on top of the design space, separated by a turquoise slider. As you will come to expect from Superalgos, the charting space is configurable and highly flexible. Everything that happens there is defined on the Charting Space hierarchy.
The charting space is known for blowing people's minds. Please, refrain from continuing with this tutorial if you are currently under the influence of psychoactive substances.
